text_direction=”default” css=”.vc_custom_1709580121110{margin-bottom: -50px !important;}”]
WHAT & WHEN

Our first of 5 unique PFP drops. Banana Kingdom Warlords are 1800 1 of 1 unique PFP’S representing the 18 unique regions of the Banana Kingdom — coming to the Arbitrum Nova blockchain on March 26th.

HOW TO GET ONE

Warlords are not for sale, but are free (limit 2 per wallet) for anyone who stakes Banana Coins for Warlord Tokens.

UTILITIES INCLUDED

Warlords will be stakeable when 3X staking opens and remain stakeable for up to 24 months. Warlords will also have varying bonus attack and defense buffs built in when you use them in-game within the region the Warlord is from.

BONUS

Enter for a chance to win one via Premint

 

QUESTIONS?

 

 [/vc_column_text][toggles style=”minimal_small” accordion=”true” accordion_starting_functionality=”closed”][toggle color=”Default” heading_tag=”h6″ heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”I HAVE A QUESTION ABOUT STAKING“][vc_column_text text_direction=”default”]For questions about staking see the FAQ section here.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” heading_tag=”h6″ heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”THIS PROJECT’S INTERESTING, I’D LIKE TO HOST AN AMA OR ASK SOME QUESTIONS“][vc_column_text text_direction=”default”]Reach out to Caesar in our Discord, or send an email to wukong@bananakingdom.com and the team will get back to you the same day.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” heading_tag=”h6″ heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”MY QUESTION WASN’T ANSWERED OR I NEED HELP“][vc_column_text text_direction=”default”]Head to our Discord and open up a Support Ticket, someone will help you out the same day.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][/toggles][/vc_column][/vc_row]
